mapper.select: select p.*, h.product_photo from product p, category c, product_Photo h where p.category_No = c.category_No and p.product_No=h.product_No and large='신발' and batch='1'
select p.*, h.product_photo, h.color from product p, category c, product_Photo h where p.category_no = c.category_no and p.product_no=h.product_no and large = '상의' and small = '후드' and batch ='1'
select count(*) from product p, category c where p.category_no = c.category_no and c.large = '상의' and c.small = '후드'
select product_photo, color from category c, product p, product_photo h where c.category_no=p.category_no and p.product_no=h.product_no and p.product_no='1' and batch='1'
select count(*) from category c, product p, product_photo h where c.category_no=p.category_no and p.product_no=h.product_no and p.product_no='1' and batch='1'

select p.*, d.color, d.stock, d.product_size, h.product_photo,d.product_detail_no from product p, product_detail d , product_photo h where p.product_no = d.product_no and p.product_no=h.product_no and d.color=h.color and h.batch=1 order by p.product_no
